Allows the app to customize Live TV app

Set system-wide preferences for closed captions
Unable to start the system-wide preferences for closed captions.
Enter your PIN to watch this channel
Enter your PIN to watch this program

plurals.item: You entered the wrong PIN 5 times.\nTry again in %1$d second.
You entered the wrong PIN 5 times.\nTry again in %1$d seconds.

resources.string: That PIN was wrong. Try again.
Live TV app will use the ZIP Code to provide a complete program guide for the TV channels.
Choose channels for your program guide
Record while watching so you can pause or rewind live programs.\nWarning: This may decrease the life of the internal storage by the intensive use of the storage.
To watch this channel, press Right and enter your PIN
To watch this program, press Right and enter your PIN
This program is unrated.\nTo watch this program, press Right and enter your PIN
This program is rated %1$s.\nTo watch this program, press Right and enter your PIN.
To watch this channel, use the default Live TV app.
To watch this program, use the default Live TV app.
This program is unrated.\nTo watch this program, use the default Live TV app.
This program is rated %1$s.\nTo watch this program, use the default Live TV app.

plurals.name: tvview_msg_input_no_resource
plurals.item: This channel can\'t be played until %1$s because another channel is being recorded. \n\nPress Right to adjust recording schedule.
This channel can\'t be played until %1$s because other channels are being recorded. \n\nPress Right to adjust recording schedule.

resources.string: Browse apps that offer live channels
New channel sources have channels to offer.\nSet them up now, or do this later in the channel sources setting.
Press SELECT to access the TV menu.
Tuner type not suitable. Please launch Live TV app for tuner type TV input.
No app was found to handle this action.
All source channels are hidden.\nSelect at least one channel to watch.
BACK key is for connected device. Press HOME button to exit.
Live TV needs permission to read the TV listings.
Store some TS data before exceptions/crash for debugging.
Live TV are updating recording schedules.

Live channels combines the experience of traditional TV channels with streaming channels provided by apps. \n\nGet started by setting up the channel sources already installed. Or browse Google Play Store for more apps that offer live channels.
%1$s has been scheduled to be recorded
Select the episodes you would like to delete. They can\'t be recovered once deleted.
When there are too many programs to be recorded at the same time, only the ones with higher priorities will be recorded.
One-time recordings have the highest priority
The programs will not be recorded if you keep watching this channel. Cancel the recordings, or current channel will be blocked when the recording starts.
The recordings of %1$s and %2$s are incomplete.
The recordings of %1$s, %2$s and %3$s are incomplete.
The recording of %1$s didn\'t complete due to insufficient storage.
The recordings of %1$s and %2$s didn\'t complete due to insufficient storage.
The recordings of %1$s, %2$s and %3$s didn\'t complete due to insufficient storage.

You will be able to record programs with DVR. However there is not enough storage on your device now for DVR to work. Please connect an external drive that is %1$dGB or larger and follow the steps to format it as device storage.
This program will not be recorded because there is not enough storage. Try deleting some existing recordings.

Some of the storage used by DVR is missing. Please connect the external drive you used before to re-enable DVR. Alternately, you can forget the storage in the storage settings, if it\'s no longer available.
The recording seems to be deleted.
The recorded content will be saved.
The recording of %1$s will be stopped because it conflicts with this program. The recorded content will be saved.
Recording has started but has conflicts
Some parts of %1$s will not be recorded.
Some parts of %1$s and %2$s will not be recorded.
Some parts of %1$s, %2$s and one more schedule will not be recorded.

Some parts of %1$s, %2$s and %3$d more schedules will not be recorded.

resources.string: What would you like to record?
How long would you like to record?

This program has already been recorded. Its available in the DVR library.
